books.author: by Michael Wolff
books.description: A journalist offers an inside account of the first year of the Trump White House.
books.name: FIRE AND FURY

books.author: by David Cay Johnston
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist describes how he believes the scope of the Trump presidency differs from all the others.
books.name: IT'S EVEN WORSE THAN YOU THINK

books.author: by Doug Stanton
books.description: A small group of Special Forces operatives fought the Taliban on horseback shortly after Sept. 11. The basis of the movie "12 Strong."
books.name: HORSE SOLDIERS

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the laws that govern the universe.
books.name: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY

books.author: by David Frum
books.description: A former speechwriter for George W. Bush argues how the current president might push America to become an illiberal democracy.
books.name: TRUMPOCRACY

books.author: by Walter Isaacson
books.description: A biography of the Italian Renaissance polymath which connects his work in various disciplines.
books.name: LEONARDO DA VINCI

books.author: by Women's March Organizers and Condé Nast
books.description: Photographs and profiles of the organizers and participants of the 2017 Women’s March.
books.name: TOGETHER WE RISE

books.author: by Steven Levitsky and Daniel Ziblatt
books.description: The Harvard professors examine the erosion of democracies in Europe and Latin America and recommend ways to avoid authoritarianism.
books.name: HOW DEMOCRACIES DIE

books.author: by Niall Ferguson
books.description: The historian uses network theory to understand the past and the present.
books.name: THE SQUARE AND THE TOWER

books.author: by Tiffany Haddish
books.description: The comedian recounts growing up in South Central Los Angeles, exacting revenge on an ex-boyfriend and finding success after a period of homelessness.
books.name: THE LAST BLACK UNICORN

books.author: by Daniel H. Pink
books.description: Research from several fields reveals the ideal time to make small decisions and big life changes.
books.name: WHEN

books.author: by Ron Chernow
books.description: A biography of the Union general of the Civil War and two-term president of the United States.
books.name: GRANT

books.author: by J.D. Vance
books.description: A Yale Law School graduate looks at the struggles of the white working class through the story of his own childhood.
books.name: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: A true-crime story involving a lawyer, his wife and a man claiming to be a Securities and Exchange Commission agent.
books.name: HOME SWEET MURDER
